channel.title: Edison, IoT on David G. Simmons
channel.description: Recent content in Edison, IoT on David G. Simmons

item.title: Intel Edison Update
item.description: I need to amend my previous post about the Intel Edison. It turns out it may not be the Edison module itself but rather the Intel Mini-Breakout Board that is at fault when t comes to at least the I2C failure. I still have to see about the SPI failures. Here’s why I have reached that conclusion: I ordered some of the Sparkfun Blocks for Intel Edison© and went back to fooling with them.
